H0.text: Which city was known as Edo before assuming its current name in 1868. Osaka

H1.text: Which city was known as Edo before assuming its current name in 1868. Kyoto

H2.text: Which city was known as Edo before assuming its current name in 1868. Nagoya

H3.text: Which city was known as Edo before assuming its current name in 1868. 東京

A4.text: Edo (Japanese: 江戸, lit. 'bay-entrance' or 'estuary'), also romanized as Jedo, Yedo or Yeddo, is the former name of Tokyo.
